lead_paragraph: Jeff Francoeur was beaned in the second inning of the Atlanta Braves’ game against the St. Louis Cardinals, and was down for a few minutes before walking off the field. Francoeur did not lose consciousness after being hit by the Cardinals’ Todd Wellemeyer in Jupiter, Fla.
